caption.p: Effect of solid surface structure on wetting behavior: ( a) Wenzel mode [ 70], ( b) Cassie–Baxter mode [ 76], ( c) intermediate states between the Wenzel and the Cassie modes [ 33]; reproduced with permission from Wiley. ( d) Illustration of the “tilted plate” method to measure advancing/receding angle, respectively when the drop just starts to move [ 73]; reproduced with permission from Springer. ( e) Illustration of the sliding angle [ 83]; reproduced with permission from the Royal Society of Chemistry.
